title: Discovering texture (TEFC)
creator_credit: Film Associates, Paul Burnford and Jack Stoops
brief_description: Explains that every surface has texture and than an object may have several textures. Points out that we learn about textures by touching the surfaces of objects and looking at the way light reflects from these surfaces. Shows how paints, tools and materials are used to change the texture of surfaces.
